TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IUpdateSqlGenerator
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IUpdateSqlGenerator implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Update.Internal.ISingletonUpdateSqlGenerator

summary.para: A service used to generate SQL for insert, update, and delete commands, and related SQL operations needed for
This type is typically used by database providers; it is generally not used in application code.
The service lifetime is . This means a single instance is used by many instances. The implementation must be thread-safe. This service cannot depend on services registered as .

Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information.
